TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 疣囊薹草 ( 原变种) you nang tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Culms rather stout. Leaf blades 3–5 mm wide. Inflorescence 3–7.5 cm. Fl. and fr. Jul–Aug.
treatment.distribution: Forested slopes, meadows. Heilongjiang, Jilin, Liaoning, Nei Mongol [Japan, Russia (Far East, E Siberia)].
